resources.string: Make application without coding : Applop helps in expanding and managing your business, a single tool in form of mobile app that serves as an integrated solution to retain old customers and attract new. With click of a button you updates will be notified through push notification to all your users.

To Make Mobile App you just need 5 minutes, Give a Miss call to 18002700222 or visit http://applop.com and download Applop app, from there click on "Make your own app" and fill in the details, your App will be live in 24 hours in play store. This is a demo app just to show you how your app will look like
